The user moves close behind a target and carefully matches their movements, following them in the same way that a leaf is followed by its shadow. Simply mimicking a target in this way does no harm to them, but it's useful as a setup for other techniques, such as the [[Front Lotus]] or the [[Lion Combo]]. Because of how difficult it can be to use this technique, most [[genin]] are unlikely to be talented enough to perform it.<ref name="d1"/>

== Trivia ==
* ''[[Rin no Sho]]'' claims [[Neji Hyūga]] is skilled enough to use Shadow of the Dancing Leaf,<ref name="d1"/> though he never actually was.
